Plugins.desc: Customize your workspace by adding commands everywhere, create Macros and supercharge your mobile toolbar.

Plugins.desc: Assign colors to tags. Has integrations with other plugins, like Kanban.

Plugins.desc: create component for your obsidian

Plugins.name: Copy Path
Plugins.desc: Adds context menu actions for copying the full/vault-relative path of files and folders.

Plugins.desc: Copy to clipboard, Open in default app, Show in system explorer, Reveal file in navigation, Open in new tab context menus for images.

Plugins.desc: Add zoom and drag functionality to diagrams from Mermaid, Plantuml, Graphviz, Gravizo and so on

Plugins.name: Extended Graph
Plugins.desc: Extends the features of the core Graph view, display images, manage states, remove links, change node shapes, and more.

Plugins.name: Folder notes
Plugins.desc: Create notes within folders that can be accessed without collapsing the folder, similar to the functionality offered in Notion.

Plugins.desc: Easily see and access any plugin's settings or hotkey assignments (and conflicts) from the Community Plugins tab

Plugins.desc: Media(Video/Audio) Playback Enhancement for Obsidian.md

Plugins.desc: Add customizable toolbars to your notes.

Plugins.desc: This is an Obsidian plugin which is another choice of Quick switcher.

Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin to edit and view Excalidraw drawings

Plugins.desc: Easily convert your article to image.

Plugins.name: Image Toolkit
Plugins.desc: This plugin provides some image viewing toolkit.

Plugins.desc: Formats and styles your notes. It can be used to format YAML tags, aliases, arrays, and metadata; footnotes; headings; spacing; math blocks; regular markdown contents like list, italics, and bold styles; and more with the use of custom rule options as well.

Plugins.name: List Callouts
Plugins.desc: Create simple callouts in lists.

Plugins.name: Sortable
Plugins.desc: Wiki-like table sorting.

Plugins.name: Spaced Repetition
Plugins.desc: Fight the forgetting curve by reviewing flashcards & entire notes.

Plugins.name: Style Settings
Plugins.desc: Offers controls for adjusting theme, plugin, and snippet CSS variables.

Plugins.name: PDF++
Plugins.desc: The most Obsidian-native PDF annotation tool ever.

Plugins.name: Periodic Notes
Plugins.desc: Create/manage your daily, weekly, and monthly notes

Plugins.desc: Pixel perfect 100% image resizing, copy to clipboard, show image in Finder/Explorer, edit image in external editor, and much more.

Plugins.desc: Active POWER MODE!!!!

Plugins.name: Zen Mode

Plugins.desc: Replace the default file explorer with a clean two-pane interface featuring folder tree, tag browsing, file previews, keyboard navigation, drag-and-drop, pinned notes, and customizable display options.

Plugins.desc: View and manage text highlights, comments on highlights, native comments, and collections for your highlights.
